import java.util.Scanner;

/**
 * dp，但是比赛的时候没想到该怎么向后推，目前做的所有的几乎都是根据前面的状态来推
 */
public class E {
    static Scanner scanner = new Scanner();

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        int t = scanner.nextInt();
        while (t-- > 0) {
            solve1();
        }
    }

    static void solve1() {
        int n = scanner.nextInt();
        int[] nums = new int[n];
        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            nums[i] = scanner.nextInt();
        }

        boolean[] dp = new boolean[n + 1];
        dp[0] = true;
        for(int j = 0; j <= n; j++) {
            if(j > 0) {
                if(j - nums[j-1] >= 1) {
                    dp[j] = true;
                }
            }
            if(j < n && dp[j]) {
                if(j + nums[j] + 1 <= n) {
                    dp[j + nums[j] + 1] = true;
                }
            }
        }
        System.out.println(dp[n] ? "YES" : "NO");
    }
}
